ComicInfo.Summary: In the not-too-distant future, the world will be just as it is todayâ€¦only worse. Evil has permeated the very fabric of society, from the halls of government to the darkened alleyways. Will the heroes who once defended the downtrodden fail them now? Will a new generation rise, inspired by the last of the old? Who will be The Last Shadowhawk?
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bill Sienkiewicz,Brett Evans,Brian Haberlin,Chance Wolf,Daniel Henriques,Federico Blee,Jim Valentino,Jimmie Robinson,Juan Fernandez,Marat Mychaels,Philip Tan,Rob Liefeld
